mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_name = #{user_name}, user_nick = #{user_nick}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_email = #{user_email}, user_birth = #{user_birth} WHERE user_id = #{user_id} and user_pwd = #{user_pwd}

UPDATE question_board set quest_view=quest_view+1 WHERE quest_id=#{quest_id}
